I'll hold the front,"},{"lineNumber":29092,"originalJapaneseLine":"　煙幕にまぎれて撤退するしか……）","translatedEnglishLine":" and we have no choice but to retreat under the cover of smoke...)"} ,{"lineNumber":29093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Quietly...\""},{"lineNumber":29094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああああああぁっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaaaa!?\""},{"lineNumber":29095,"originalJapaneseLine":"後ろから忍び寄ったランスが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance sneaked up from behind,"},{"lineNumber":29096,"originalJapaneseLine":"いきなりランの胸を鷲掴みにした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and suddenly grabbed Ran's chest with a handful."},{"lineNumber":29097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、グッドな感触だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, what a good feeling.\""},{"lineNumber":29098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランスさん……！？　……いえ、総統。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance-san...? No, Supreme Commander."},{"lineNumber":29099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうして、ここに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you here...?\""},{"lineNumber":29100,"originalJapaneseLine":"突き飛ばしておいてから、","translatedEnglishLine":"After pushing him away,"},{"lineNumber":29101,"originalJapaneseLine":"訝しげにランスを見る。","translatedEnglishLine":"She looked at Lance suspiciously."},{"lineNumber":29102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしたもこうしたも、負けそうではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's the matter, what's the matter, aren't we about to lose?"},{"lineNumber":29103,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピンチなんだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're in a pinch, right?\""},{"lineNumber":29104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……ええ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... yes...\""},{"lineNumber":29105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「煙幕と同時に突っ込む。邪魔する奴は皆殺しだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We charge with the smoke bomb. Anyone who gets in our way will be annihilated."},{"lineNumber":29106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランちゃんたちはその後に詰めてこい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ran, you and the others follow up after that.\""},{"lineNumber":29107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……？　煙幕で……逃げるのではなく？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...? With the smoke bomb... not to escape?\""},{"lineNumber":29108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「換装、煙幕いけます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Switching gear, smoke bomb ready!\""},{"lineNumber":29109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろんだ。チャンスを作ったなら突撃だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course. If we create a chance, we storm in."},{"lineNumber":29110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいぞ、撃て！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good, shoot!\""},{"lineNumber":29111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……都市長？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...? City Mayor?\""},{"lineNumber":29112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……う、撃って！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... Y-Yes, fire!\""},{"lineNumber":29113,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぉっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Woah!?\""},{"lineNumber":29114,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場を覆うほどの広大さはないが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though not vast enough to cover the entire battlefield,"},{"lineNumber":29115,"originalJapaneseLine":"先頭を切って突っ込んでくる魔軍の視界が、","translatedEnglishLine":"the vision of the demon army charging at the forefront,"},{"lineNumber":29116,"originalJapaneseLine":"真っ白く閉ざされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was completely obscured by whiteness."},{"lineNumber":29117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははは！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahaha!!"},{"lineNumber":29118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっつげーーーーき！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Chargeeeeee!!\""},{"lineNumber":29119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無茶させおって…………黒色破壊光線！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're making us do the impossible... Black Destruction Beam!\""},{"lineNumber":29120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ、ぐわああ、なんだ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-Guaaah, what is that!?\""},{"lineNumber":29121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様だ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's Lord Lance!!\""},{"lineNumber":29122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":29123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人殺しのランス総統閣下が来てやったぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon Slayer, Supreme Commander Lance, has arrived!"},{"lineNumber":29124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍なんぞ皆殺しだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll massacre the demon army!\""},{"lineNumber":29125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あげは、周りの確認お願いね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ageha, please check the surroundings.\""},{"lineNumber":29126,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お任せよ〜。煙幕なんて、あたしには無いも同然」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Leave it to me~. Smoke bombs are practically nonexistent to me.\""},{"lineNumber":29127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「派手に、派手に……ううん、火の子！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Loudly, loudly... No, little flame!\""},{"lineNumber":29128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわああ！？　ま、魔法ッ……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guaaah!? M-Magic...!?\""},{"lineNumber":29129,"originalJapaneseLine":"カロリアの右腕からの火炎放射が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A flamethrower blast from Karoria's right arm,"},{"lineNumber":29130,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵を薙ぎ払う。","translatedEnglishLine":"swept through the demon soldiers."},{"lineNumber":29131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よしっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright.\""},{"lineNumber":29132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、地味って言われた気がするぜー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I feel like I just got called plain.\""},{"lineNumber":29133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、そうじゃないよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, that's not what I meant!\""},{"lineNumber":29134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":29135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死ね死ね死ねーーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Die, die, diiiiie!\""},{"lineNumber":29136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔っ人ー魔っ人ー出っておいで〜♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Devils—devils—come out♪"},{"lineNumber":29137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　男は殺せ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill the men!"},{"lineNumber":29138,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女は嬲れ！　","translatedEnglishLine":"Torture the women!"},{"lineNumber":29139,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして殺す！","translatedEnglishLine":"And then kill them all!"},{"lineNumber":29140,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヤッホーヤッホー♪","translatedEnglishLine":"Yahho yahho♪\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （仕方ない……私が正面を押さえて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It can't be helped... I'll hold the front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 煙幕にまぎれて撤退するしか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we have no choice but to retreat under the cover of smoke...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろから忍び寄ったランスが、
いきなりランの胸を鷲掴みにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and suddenly grabbed Ran's chest with a handful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、グッドな感触だ」
突き飛ばしておいてから、
訝しげにランスを見る。
「どうしたもこうしたも、負けそうではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's the matter, what's the matter, aren't we about to lose?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「煙幕と同時に突っ込む。邪魔する奴は皆殺しだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We charge with the smoke bomb. Anyone who gets in our way will be annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランちゃんたちはその後に詰めてこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran, you and the others follow up after that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え……？　煙幕で……逃げるのではなく？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh...? With the smoke bomb... not to escape?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろんだ。チャンスを作ったなら突撃だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. If we create a chance, we storm in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場を覆うほどの広大さはないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though not vast enough to cover the entire battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先頭を切って突っ込んでくる魔軍の視界が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the vision of the demon army charging at the forefront,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無茶させおって…………黒色破壊光線！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're making us do the impossible... Black Destruction Beam!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人殺しのランス総統閣下が来てやったぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Slayer, Supreme Commander Lance, has arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あげは、周りの確認お願いね」
「お任せよ〜。煙幕なんて、あたしには無いも同然」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Leave it to me~. Smoke bombs are practically nonexistent to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派手に、派手に……ううん、火の子！」
カロリアの右腕からの火炎放射が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flamethrower blast from Karoria's right arm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、地味って言われた気がするぜー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I feel like I just got called plain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ね死ね死ねーーーーい！」
「魔っ人ー魔っ人ー出っておいで〜♪

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It can't be helped... I'll hold the front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 煙幕にまぎれて撤退するしか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we have no choice but to retreat under the cover of smoke...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろから忍び寄ったランスが、
いきなりランの胸を鷲掴みにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and suddenly grabbed Ran's chest with a handful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、グッドな感触だ」
突き飛ばしておいてから、
訝しげにランスを見る。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's the matter, what's the matter, aren't we about to lose?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「煙幕と同時に突っ込む。邪魔する奴は皆殺しだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We charge with the smoke bomb. Anyone who gets in our way will be annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランちゃんたちはその後に詰めてこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran, you and the others follow up after that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え……？　煙幕で……逃げるのではなく？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh...? With the smoke bomb... not to escape?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろんだ。チャンスを作ったなら突撃だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. If we create a chance, we storm in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場を覆うほどの広大さはないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though not vast enough to cover the entire battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先頭を切って突っ込んでくる魔軍の視界が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the vision of the demon army charging at the forefront,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無茶させおって…………黒色破壊光線！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're making us do the impossible... Black Destruction Beam!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人殺しのランス総統閣下が来てやったぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Slayer, Supreme Commander Lance, has arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あげは、周りの確認お願いね」
「お任せよ〜。煙幕なんて、あたしには無いも同然」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Leave it to me~. Smoke bombs are practically nonexistent to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派手に、派手に……ううん、火の子！」
カロリアの右腕からの火炎放射が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flamethrower blast from Karoria's right arm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、地味って言われた気がするぜー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I feel like I just got called plain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ね死ね死ねーーーーい！」
「魔っ人ー魔っ人ー出っておいで〜♪
